official_title: A resolution to authorize the President to issue a proclamation designating the week beginning on November 19, 1978 as "National Family Week".

summary.text: Authorizes and requests the Presidents to designate the week beginning on November 19, 1978, as "National Family Week."

titles.title: A resolution to authorize the President to issue a proclamation designating the week beginning on November 19, 1978 as "National Family Week".
